lead_paragraph: Let your hearts be filled with holiday cheer when Miracle on 34th Street (1947) returns to cinemas nationwide in a special two-day event on Sunday, December 20 and Wednesday, December 23. To purchase your tickets, visit www.FathomEvents.com.
